text: Drepana dispilata is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Warren in 1922. It is found in northern India, Sikkim, northern Myanmar and the Chinese provinces of Sichuan, Yunnan and Shaanxi. ==Subspecies== *Drepana dispilata dispilata (northern India, Sikkim, northern Myanmar) *Drepana dispilata grisearipennis Strand, 1911 (China: Sichuan) *Drepana dispilata rufata Watson, 1968 (China: Yunnan, Shaanxi) ==References== Category:Moths described in 1922 Category:Drepaninae
title: Drepana dispilata
